issue.title: [R] Implement halffloat -> R conversion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7753](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7753). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-3783

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7753?focusedCommentId=17038408) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
`[~npr]` is this important soon or just "nice to have"?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7753?focusedCommentId=17038473) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
AFAIK it's not urgent. Original issue is 1.5 years old. I just picked it up because I thought it would be a quick win; didn't realize that halffloat was so sparsely implemented in Arrow C++.
